text: Frank "Frankie" A. Howard (December 1, 1938 â€“ July 27, 2020) was an American law enforcement officer and politician. He was a member of the Louisiana House of Representatives from 2008 to 2020. Howard was born in Hornbeck, Louisiana. He was a member of the Republican Party. From 1976 to 2000, he was the sheriff of Vernon Parish, Louisiana. Howard died from problems caused by COVID-19 on July 27, 2020 in Baton Rouge, Louisiana at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Louisiana Category:Members of the Louisiana State Legislature Category:American police officers Category:Politicians from Louisiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Frank A. Howard
